description: Miguel and Mitch are beginning to fall in love, but Miguel is still hoping for a helping hand. He thinks he may have found the perfect candidate when he is called to join a sizzling threeway with Johnny and a wealthy client (Hassan Sharif) at New Yorks ritzy Plaza Hotel. Unfortunately, the client ends up being more interested in Johnny.
title: Hotel Threesome: Miguel Antonio, Johnny Davis, and Hassan Sharif
